Module edu.ntnu.idatx1002
Package edu.ntnu.idatx1002

Class List

java.lang.Object
edu.ntnu.idatx1002.List
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class List
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Represents a list of Task's. A list can be sorted by priority or dates. Lists containing only chosen categories or priorities can be returned to the user. As an example may all tasks containing the category "Work" be returned as one list.
See Also:
